suite.name: Verify Valid Credential Suite

kw.name: Append To Environment Variable
kw.doc: Appends given ``values`` to environment variable ``name``.
kw.msg: Environment variable 'path' set to value 'C:\Program Files\Common Files\Oracle\Java\javapath;C:\WINDOWS\system32;C:\WINDOWS;C:\WINDOWS\System32\Wbem;C:\WINDOWS\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\;C:\WINDOWS\System32\OpenSSH\;C:\Program Files (x86)\Intel\Intel(R) Management Engine Components\DAL;C:\Program Files\Intel\Intel(R) Management Engine Components\DAL;C:\MinGW\bin;C:\Program Files\Git\cmd;C:\Users\MANOJ\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python310\Scripts\;C:\Users\MANOJ\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python310\;C:\Users\MANOJ\AppData\Local\Microsoft\WindowsApps;;C:\Users\MANOJ\AppData\Local\Programs\Microsoft VS Code\bin;C:\Users\MANOJ\OneDrive\Desktop\OrangeHRMAutomation\driver'.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
Log level changed from NONE to INFO.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
